item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, December 5, 2024 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Diátaxis – A systematic approach to technical documentation authoring (365 points | 85 comments)
2. Show HN: Replace "hub" by "ingest" in GitHub URLs for a prompt-friendly extract (8 points | 1 comment)
3. Federal Court Says Dismantling a Phone to Install Firmware Isn't a 'Search' (58 points | 25 comments)
4. Training myself to run farther with Strava's API and an IoT dog feeder of M&Ms (23 points | 5 comments)
5. Genie 2: A large-scale foundation world model (1134 points | 374 comments)
6. Waymo announces Miami as its next ride hailing city (66 points | 33 comments)
7. They don't make them like that any more: the Yamaha DX7 keyboard (257 points | 167 comments)
8. Move semantics in Rust, C++, and Hylo (72 points | 79 comments)
9. Sitters and Standers (334 points | 164 comments)
10. Oscilloscope Music N-Spheres (86 points | 16 comments)
11. Humanloop (YC S20) Is Hiring Product Engineers in London and SF ( | hide)
12. Bringing K/V context quantisation to Ollama (193 points | 26 comments)
13. AI helps researchers dig through old maps to find lost oil and gas wells (214 points | 91 comments)
14. Show HN: Outerbase Studio – Open-Source Database GUI (302 points | 125 comments)
15. VectorChord: Store 400k Vectors for $1 in PostgreSQL (129 points | 34 comments)
16. My son (9 yrs old) used plain JavaScript to make a game, and wants your feedback (1117 points | 445 comments)
17. Native dual-range input (225 points | 41 comments)
18. Why America's economy is soaring ahead of its rivals (407 points | 1833 comments)
19. The story of Rogue (236 points | 91 comments)
20. Show HN: I combined spaced repetition with emails so you can remember anything (206 points | 76 comments)
21. WASM-4: Build retro games using WebAssembly for a fantasy console (117 points | 29 comments)
22. Speeding up Ruby by rewriting C in Ruby (273 points | 106 comments)
23. IMG_0001 (1727 points | 274 comments)
24. The Surprising New History of Horse Domestication (20 points | 12 comments)
25. Ampere WS-1 Japanese APL Clamtop (44 points | 5 comments)
26. Launch HN: Parsagon (YC W21) – AI for public affairs and government relations (64 points | 48 comments)
27. Self-Funding Harberger Taxes (83 points | 75 comments)
28. Show HN: A 5th order motion planner with PH spline blending, written in Ada (108 points | 31 comments)
29. The Hoare Cube (79 points | 16 comments)
30. History of rat control in Alberta (89 points | 84 comments)
